fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Events Ranked by Revenue
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to link events through registrations to invoices and calculate total revenue per event.

InputDefinition.userMessage: Show me all events from the past year ranked by total revenue generated, including the number of registrations for each event. Display as a table. Let me click on an event to see who registered for it.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes a table of events ranked by revenue
Revenue amounts are properly calculated and formatted
Registration counts are included for each event
Only events from past year are included
Events are sorted in descending order by revenue
Clicking event shows registration list with member details
Registration table allows opening individual member records
